## System.init() method

Called when system is added to a gameObject

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @override */
init?(param?: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  param | any | optional params |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

The difference between init and awake is that `init` method recieves params. Both of those methods are called early than `start` method. Use this method to prepare data, ect.
